title: Apply for Entry Level Stewardship (ELS) Online

details.description: Apply online for Entry level stewardship - for farmers, agricultural land owners and their agents
details.alternative_title: Entry Level Stewardship or Uplands Entry Level Stewardship Online
details.more_information:
ELS Online lets you:

+ apply for ELS electronically - or an agent can apply on your behalf 
+ save time - with tools like the boundary measurement tool, the automatic points calendar and scribble map facility 
+ avoid mistakes - by checking the fields and amounts you enter

##Getting help
Contact the ELS Online team if you need help or information when completing your online application.

$C
**ELS Online Team**  
<els.online@naturalengland.org.uk>  
0300 060 3934 
$C

##Find out more
You can [learn more about ELS Online](http://www.naturalengland.gov.uk/ourwork/farming/funding/es/els/online/default.aspx "ELS Online (Natural England)"){:rel="external"} on the Natural England website.

Natural England also provides [free webinars](http://www.naturalengland.org.uk/ourwork/farming/funding/es/els/online/elsonlinewebinars.aspx "ELS Online - webinars (Natural England)"){:rel="external"} to help you learn how to use the ELS application.

##Cross compliance
These standards are part of [cross compliance.](http://rpa.defra.gov.uk/rpa/index.nsf/UIMenu/814240C66F10CAC8802570C7004248D4?Opendocument "Cross compliance (Rural Payments Agency)"){:rel="external"} You must meet them to get your farming subsidy under the [Single Payment Scheme](/single-payment-scheme-online "Manage your Single Payment Scheme online"). 


*[ELS]: Entry Level Stewardship
details.introduction: ELS Online is a quick and easy way to apply for Entry Level Stewardship or Uplands Entry Level Stewardship.
